data.title: Shiv Parekh
data.meta_description: Shiv Parekh on the 2022 30 Under 30 - Asia - Finance & Venture Capital - With a family background in real estate, Parekh founded hBits, India's tech-enabled
data.text: With a family background in real estate, Parekh founded hBits, India's tech-enabled fractional property ownership platform in 2019. The company allows investments as low as $30,000 in commercial real estate that generates rents from properties such as office buildings. hBits claimed to have $20 million in assets under management as of the end of last year with 30,000 registered users. Parekh has an MBA from Harvard and a bachelor's degree in engineering physics from Stanford. He is a director at property firm Raycon Group and also founded its subsidiary coworking company WorkLoft.
